tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My wife was having difficult pregnancy with lot of vomiting and acidity and dehydration when we visited doctor for first time . medicine prescribed and diet counseling was so good that she improved in a couple of days without the need of admission.the journey throughout rest of pregnancy was excellent and we went on to deliver a healthy baby normally.we are satisfied with the doctor and recommend her for pregnant ladies 
Thanks ma'am

I recommend Dr shalini for the advanced surgeries of uterus to any one looking for an expert doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am reviewing dr shalini after 8 years of my ectopic pregnancy which was laparoscopically removed effortlessly by her in 2015 .. it was a very difficult case and i had lost almost all of my blood in my abdomen.. i showed myself previous day elsewhere but they couldn‚Äôt diagnose my condtion and it was dr shalini who immediately diagnosed and treated me also .. it was a lifesaver for me
Thank you maam for everything
Today also i visit her for myself and my teenage daughters

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Shalini is a well known and professional Doctor. And without any second thought I would recommend my family and friends to reach out to her incase they are in need.

Secondly I would like to little verify the statement of one of reviews given by Ms. Prachi Tyagi who has written a feedback for Doctor -allow me to provide you small clarification here. I am the person you are referring in your review ‚Äúas friends‚Äù- I am her patient and on 19 April , even though you were sitting there but I am sure you are not aware that I was already undergoing the procedure and went out for some time bound activity and I have very minimal time to action on the procedure and hence she allowed me inside her cabin- she was not entertaining us- it was the need of the hour and I appreciate your patience there. However I very clearly remember that she did speak to in the other cabin of her Clinic while I had some procedure requirement to rest . So let us be humble, understand doctor methodology of operating. I hope you are feeling better now. Take care and cheers 

Thanks Dr Shalini for you being amazing Doctor and moreover amazing human being 

Keep growing in your career all the best

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Well she's an expert in her field the way she handles patients and educates them about the cause and the problem. She's a very good doctor and guides her patients correctly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shalini is like a god to us not for a one time pregnancy but for a entire age of our struggle to get our second baby ‚ÄúJayansh‚Äù. She is sis to me and to my wife and we can bet of her experience and expertise and Exelence in handling the most critical cases, out baby is now of 6 months and I wanted to post this since long. Our experience with Dr. Shalini is really so delighted and rich that it is different to cover in sort summary, but we are so thankful to her for years of care and our second baby. Thank you Mam. Much much appreciate for your efforts and support. You have been more than a Doc to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
One of my friend recommended Dr. Shalini , and I am fully satisfied with the quality treatment from her . In this Corona time, there was always proper consultation from her. I am thankful for the same .
Few of my observations, that could be helpful to others .
1. Ma‚Äôam listen to your query very well, and gives you solutions for everything. (You will feel friendly in your first meeting itself )
2. Staff is supportive 
3. No hassle in any samples or reports , as everything is available at your door steps.
4. For everything, you will get clear prior instruction from Ma‚Äôam. You need not to worry. But still if any emergency, She is available to guide you . (Special Mention - my call was received at late night )
5. You can expect best of the support from her in your beautiful journey .

Thank you so much Dr. Shalini for making my journey hassle free and memorable. I will definetly recommend ‚ÄúMOTHER CARE CLINIC ‚Äú in my circle .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I will give her 5/5. We were not satisfied with our doctor and then we visited her (referred by a friend). A very patient doctor who gives you all the time required. She answers all the queries and calms you down. She throws her one-liners in between to lighten up the mood. Highly recommended from our side. One of our test did not come out as expected, and she was the only one pointing out that we should repeat the test, while no other Gynae questioned the test. The second test came out to be fine and finally we were relieved. The other doctor was only pushing us to go for a very expensive test.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Shalini‚Äôs clinic during my pregnancy. As it was my first time so don‚Äôt have any knowledge what should i do or not. But she explained each and everything in detail . She gives time to her patients properly. As per my observation she never bother about money ( fees and all) . She only focuses on customer satisfaction. ********* *** ** *** **** ****** ***** *** *** ********* , experience. As i feel she only focuses on doing normal deliveries. During my 9 month time period she never even discussed about C- section. So I personally recommend as a gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would not recommend her majorly for this reason..1. Her unsympathetic *** ********** compounder or you can say helper who don't understand others problems. In this pandemic she suggested a test and we had to show her reports only. As we requested to just view report online on what's app so we don't have to travel 10 km in such situations.Her compounder bluntly said if you visited physically so u have to come physically to show reports. If u don't have 5 min for your patient so u can expect one will travel 10 km to just show the reports.Also she sells medicine which is twice expensive.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to show my daughter last month and was given a three week course by Dr. Shalini. This month as it is the last week of the course, i had a question and wanted to contact the doctor. Her staff refused to share her number and asked me to first pay 600/- fee through Paytm and share the screenshot before doing anything. My daughter was in pain and crying at that time and i had told the staff about it, still they insisted on the payment first. I found this highly insensitive *** *** **** *** ******* *** ******** ** ******* Her staff is taking orders from her. Very insensitive and highly unprofessional! Really disappointed.
reply_text:
Hello kavita 
You yourself said you visited me last month and after a month of consultation you have the audacity to say that you wanted a free opinion  ???
And also you mentioned that your daughter was in pain .. sorry about  that , but if your conscience was clear you could have paid in a fraction of second through online payment and would have done the consultation immediately.... 
in these difficult corona times we doctors are working taking risks of our lives ( also the lives of our families) and people like you don‚Äôt want to pay our ‚Äúprofessional fees ‚Äú ü§® how mean

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I started consulting Dr. Shalini from third month of my pregnancy after juggling between various other gynaes. Once i consulted her, i was sure to continue as she heard me patiently and explained me everything in detail.

Throughout my 9 months, she nvr called me ti her clinic unnecessarily. She was always calm and was available in emergency as well. No extra med or tests and thus it was very economical for us. 

Evn though she was stuck out of town during covid lockdown, she made sure shes available on call evrytime. Her moral support and virtual assistance helped me so much.

Blessed with a baby boy Ruhaan at aakash hospital . Normal delivery. Thank you doctor. We stayed in delhi n didnt go to our hometown just because of our trust on you. N all of it was worth :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Shalini has been my gynaecologist for my delivery. She is an amazing doctor with vast experience in her domain and the best part is that she is a wonderful human being. Pregnancy is period of 9 months wherein we regularly visit the doctor and have different types of queries and apprehensions related to our pregnancy. I had a complicated and risky pregnancy from the beginning but she guided me at every step and use to patiently listen all my queries and answer them without being in any hurry. It was this friendly and caring nature that really impressed me and helped me to sail through the difficult phase of my pregnancy. I would definitely recommend her to others. I am really thankful to Dr. Shalini and my best wishes are always with her for all her future endeavors!!
reply_text: Thanks Rupali for the appreciationüôÇ.may god bless you and your entire family with a a happy and healthy lifeüåª

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Cervical Cerclage,
review: Dr Shalini has been my gynaecologist for my delivery. She was referred to us by a colleague who was also her patient. At the outset we would like to mention that she is a brilliant doctor which is exemplified by her nuanced knowledge and domain expertise. But what stands out is her friendly and caring nature. She has always been available throughtout my delivery and labour and is just a call away. She takes great care of her patients. She has a wide experience which she puts it into use with her patients. She keeps herself updated with the latest technology and knowledge so that she is abreast with latest innovations. She gives ample time to her patients and is never in a hurry. We are thankful to Dr Shalini for her constant care and support during my pregnancy.
reply_text: Thanks For the appreciation Anisha .. I know it was a difficult pregnancy for you as well but thank you so much for believing in me and being sooo patient... üòò

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I had an appointment on 19th April at 6:30, I had booked it in urgency as I was in a lot of pain but I had to wait till 8 just to see the doctor and not because there were a lot of patients but because her friends were there and she was treating them even when they arrived after me. And then I pay for the urine and culture test, I was supposed to get the reports by today but have got nothing. The number is not reachable. I live in Gurgaon so I can't go back,I think they might have taken my 500 and they might never mail or WhatsApp me the reports which was pre decided. I feel like I have wasted money and I am scared that I won't ever get the reports. I hope they read this and help me out.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Since Dr Shalini Chaudhary was the only gynecologist whom we visited during the whole period of pregnancy.
We are very fortunate that result came in our favour and we are now proud parents of baby boy.
Although, it's tough to say that she is the top on the chart but yes she really a very good doctor specially when it comes to a high risk pregnancy.
In our case, our baby was not well developing and has less water level which could leads to a several scarcity in child growth. But none of the time we felt that she is hiding or missing something to understand our baby progress.
Thanks to our decision to go with Dr Shalini as she is very polite, friendly, helpful, experienced  and always think in favour of her patient.
During the whole pregnancy check up she guided us  in such a manner that make it sense as she never told us to come in her clinic only.
She was ready to give my wife delivery at any hospital which suits us and save our money.
She is very transparent and flexible at her paitient request.
Certainly, her guidance is value for money in terms of better result without any hesitation.
Once again a big thank to Dr Shalini by standing our side always and 5 star rating from my side.
If you have still some confusion then you may contact me on 9599820065 for more clarification.
